channel.title: Workshop Setup on Documentation for Hugo Learn Theme
channel.description: Recent content in Workshop Setup on Documentation for Hugo Learn Theme

item.title: JFrog Free Cloud Trial
item.description: You will need the JFrog Platform Cloud Free Trial for this workshop. The free trial does not require a credit card or payment information to set up and includes JFrog Artifactory, XRay, and Pipelines. Go to the JFrog Platform Free Cloud Trial page. Select Microsoft Azure as your cloud provider. Populate the required fields in the form (Server Details, Create your Credentials, and User Details) and click ‘Proceed’.

item.title: Microsoft Azure
item.description: Go to Microsoft Azure. Click ‘Try Azure for free’. Click ‘Start free’. You Microsoft Azure platform is ready.
